content:
I stumbled with the Searchform.html from one of the IGs I am working on, and I have a few questions:
1) Why this has hard coded links?
2) Why this doesn't get my local template or the template = fhir.base.template#current applied?
3) If the file is created why it doesn't get included as one of the menu options? Of course I could add it manually, but first I would be needing to fix 1) and 2). And apply the changes every time I run the IG publisher.
Are there any plans to fix this or kill it?
1. it's linked to from the title bar. No need to add it menu.xml, but you can if you want
the actual searchform.html that's used is generated when the IG is published posted to the web site, based on the way the web site is configured. the one you're looking at is just a place holder
